resources.string: Canberra is the capital of Australia?
Madrid is the capital of Spain?
Paris is the capital of England?
Copenhagen is the capital of Denmark?
Buenos Aires is the capital of Argentina?
Santiago is the capital of Uruguay?
Ankara is the capital of Turkey?
Milan is the capital of Italy?
Tokyo is the capital of Japan?
Nairobi is the capital of Kenya?
"You have completed all the questions!\nDo you want to play again?"
